game.title: Legend of Mana
game.my_review: An action rpg from the PS1 era. Sporting beautiful hand drawn graphics and a world built by the player.

game.title: Harvest Moon DS - Grand Bazaar
game.my_review: A Harvest Moon game that incoporated a bazaar as your main way to gain income. Cute and simple, a great time passer.

game.title: Touhou Eiyashou - Imperishable Night
game.my_review: My main introductory into bullet hells and Touhou Project, which I still love today. Also hard as all hell.

game.title: Otome Domain
game.my_review: First visual novel in a long time that has captured my interest enough to finish all the endings.

game.title: Megadimension Neptunia VII
game.my_review: The newest Neptunia game to make it's way to PC. Has a improved system over it's predecessors with the usual Neppy goodness.
